story/root.name: Minecraft
story/root.description: The heart and story of the game

story/mine_stone.name: Stone Age
story/mine_stone.description: Mine stone with your new pickaxe

story/obtain_armor.name: Suit Up
story/obtain_armor.description: Protect yourself with a piece of iron armor

story/deflect_arrow.name: Not Today, Thank You
story/deflect_arrow.description: Deflect a projectile with a shield

story/enter_the_nether.name: We Need to Go Deeper
story/enter_the_nether.description: Build, light and enter a Nether Portal

story/enchant_item.name: Enchanter
story/enchant_item.description: Enchant an item at an Enchanting Table

story/cure_zombie_villager.name: Zombie Doctor
story/cure_zombie_villager.description: Weaken and then cure a Zombie Villager

nether/return_to_sender.name: Return to Sender
nether/return_to_sender.description: Destroy a Ghast with a fireball

nether/fast_travel.name: Subspace Bubble
nether/fast_travel.description: Use the nether to travel 7 km in the Overworld

nether/find_fortress.name: A Terrible Fortress
nether/find_fortress.description: Break your way into a nether Fortress

nether/ride_strider.name: This Boat Has Legs
nether/ride_strider.description: Ride a Strider with a Warped Fungus on a Stick

nether/uneasy_alliance.name: Uneasy Alliance
nether/uneasy_alliance.description: Rescue a Ghast from the nether, bring it safely home to the Overworld... and then kill it

nether/loot_bastion.name: War Pigs
nether/loot_bastion.description: Loot a chest in a Bastion Remnant

nether/netherite_armor.name: Cover Me in Debris
nether/netherite_armor.description: Get a full suit of netherite armor

nether/obtain_blaze_rod.name: Into Fire
nether/obtain_blaze_rod.description: Relieve a Blaze of its rod

nether/charge_respawn_anchor.name: Not Quite "Nine" Lives
nether/charge_respawn_anchor.description: Charge a Respawn Anchor to the maximum

nether/ride_strider_in_overworld_lava.name: Feels like home
nether/ride_strider_in_overworld_lava.description: Take a Strider for a loooong ride on a lava lake in the Overworld

nether/all_potions.name: A Furious Cocktail
nether/all_potions.description: Have every potion effect applied at the same time

nether/create_full_beacon.name: Beaconator
nether/create_full_beacon.description: Bring a beacon to full power

nether/all_effects.name: How Did We Get Here?
nether/all_effects.description: Have every effect applied at the same time

end/dragon_breath.name: You Need a Mint
end/dragon_breath.description: Collect dragon's breath in a glass bottle

end/find_end_city.name: The City at the End of the Game
end/find_end_city.description: Go on in, what could happen?

end/levitate.name: Great View From Up Here
end/levitate.description: Levitate up 50 blocks from the attacks of a Shulker

adventure/voluntary_exile.name: Voluntary Exile
adventure/voluntary_exile.description: Kill a raid captain. Maybe consider staying away from villages for the time being...

adventure/spyglass_at_parrot.name: Is It a Bird?
adventure/spyglass_at_parrot.description: Look at a parrot through a spyglass

adventure/read_power_of_chiseled_bookshe.name: The Power of Books
adventure/read_power_of_chiseled_bookshe.description: Read the power signal of a Chiseled Bookshelf using a Comparator

adventure/trim_with_any_armor_pattern.name: Crafting a New Look
adventure/trim_with_any_armor_pattern.description: Craft a trimmed armor at a Smithing Table

adventure/honey_block_slide.name: Sticky Situation
adventure/honey_block_slide.description: Jump into a Honey Block to break your fall

adventure/lightning_rod_with_villager_no.name: Surge Protector
adventure/lightning_rod_with_villager_no.description: Protect a villager from an undesired shock without starting a fire

adventure/fall_from_world_height.name: Caves & Cliffs
adventure/fall_from_world_height.description: Free fall from the top of the world (build limit) to the bottom of the world and survive

adventure/salvage_sherd.name: Respecting the Remnants
adventure/salvage_sherd.description: Brush a Suspicious block to obtain a Pottery Sherd

adventure/avoid_vibration.name: Sneak 100
adventure/avoid_vibration.description: Sneak near a Sculk Sensor or Warden to prevent it from detecting you

adventure/sleep_in_bed.name: Sweet Dreams
adventure/sleep_in_bed.description: Sleep in a bed to change your respawn point

adventure/hero_of_the_village.name: Hero of the Village
adventure/hero_of_the_village.description: Successfully defend a village from a raid

adventure/spyglass_at_ghast.name: Is It a Balloon?
adventure/spyglass_at_ghast.description: Look at a ghast through a spyglass

adventure/throw_trident.name: A Throwaway Joke
adventure/throw_trident.description: Throw a trident at something. Note: Throwing away your only weapon is not a good idea.

adventure/kill_mob_near_sculk_catalyst.name: It Spreads
adventure/kill_mob_near_sculk_catalyst.description: Kill a mob near a Sculk Catalyst

adventure/kill_all_mobs.name: Monsters Hunted
adventure/kill_all_mobs.description: Kill one of every hostile monster

adventure/totem_of_undying.name: Postmortal
adventure/totem_of_undying.description: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death

adventure/summon_iron_golem.name: Hired Help
adventure/summon_iron_golem.description: Summon an Iron Golem to help defend a village

adventure/trade_at_world_height.name: Star Trader
adventure/trade_at_world_height.description: Trade with a villager at the build height limit

adventure/trim_with_all_exclusive_armor_.name: Smithing with Style
adventure/trim_with_all_exclusive_armor_.description: Apply these smithing templates at least once: Spire, Snout, Rib, Ward, Silence, Vex, Tide, Wayfinder

adventure/two_birds_one_arrow.name: Two Birds, One Arrow
adventure/two_birds_one_arrow.description: Kill two Phantoms with a piercing arrow

adventure/whos_the_pillager_now.name: Who's the Pillager Now?
adventure/whos_the_pillager_now.description: Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine

adventure/arbalistic.name: Arbalistic
adventure/arbalistic.description: Kill five unique mobs with one crossbow shot

adventure/craft_decorated_pot_using_only.name: Careful Restoration
adventure/craft_decorated_pot_using_only.description: Make a Decorated Pot out of 4 Pottery Sherds

adventure/play_jukebox_in_meadows.name: Sound of Music
adventure/play_jukebox_in_meadows.description: Make the Meadows come alive with the sound of music from a jukebox

adventure/walk_on_powder_snow_with_leath.name: Light as a Rabbit
adventure/walk_on_powder_snow_with_leath.description: Walk on powder snow...without sinking in it

adventure/spyglass_at_dragon.name: Is It a Plane?
adventure/spyglass_at_dragon.description: Look at the Ender Dragon through a spyglass

adventure/sniper_duel.name: Sniper Duel
adventure/sniper_duel.description: Kill a Skeleton from at least 50 meters away

adventure/bullseye.name: Bullseye
adventure/bullseye.description: Hit the bullseye of a Target block from at least 30 meters away

adventure/brush_armadillo.name: Isn't It Scute?
adventure/brush_armadillo.description: Get Armadillo Scutes from an Armadillo using a Brush

adventure/minecraft_trials_edition.name: Minecraft: Trial(s) Edition
adventure/minecraft_trials_edition.description: Step foot in a Trial Chamber

adventure/crafters_crafting_crafters.name: Crafters Crafting Crafters
adventure/crafters_crafting_crafters.description: Be near a Crafter when it crafts a Crafter

adventure/lighten_up.name: Lighten Up
adventure/lighten_up.description: Scrape a Copper Bulb with an Axe to make it brighter

adventure/who_needs_rockets.name: Who Needs Rockets?
adventure/who_needs_rockets.description: Use a Wind Charge to launch yourself upwards 8 blocks

adventure/under_lock_and_key.name: Under Lock and Key
adventure/under_lock_and_key.description: Use an Ominous Trial Key on an Ominous Vault

adventure/revaulting.name: Revaulting
adventure/revaulting.description: Use an Ominous Trial Key on an Ominous Vault

adventure/blowback.name: Blowback
adventure/blowback.description: Kill a Breeze with a deflected Breeze-shot Wind Charge

adventure/overoverkill.name: Over-Overkill
adventure/overoverkill.description: Deal 50 hearts of damage in a single hit using the Mace

husbandry/root.name: Husbandry
husbandry/root.description: The world is full of friends and food

husbandry/safely_harvest_honey.name: Bee Our Guest
husbandry/safely_harvest_honey.description: Use a Campfire to collect Honey from a Beehive using a Bottle without aggravating the bees

husbandry/allay_deliver_item_to_player.name: You've Got a Friend in Me
husbandry/allay_deliver_item_to_player.description: Have an Allay deliver items to you

husbandry/ride_a_boat_with_a_goat.name: Whatever Floats Your Goat!
husbandry/ride_a_boat_with_a_goat.description: Get in a Boat and float with a Goat

husbandry/make_a_sign_glow.name: Glow and Behold!
husbandry/make_a_sign_glow.description: Make the text of a sign glow

husbandry/silk_touch_nest.name: Total Beelocation
husbandry/silk_touch_nest.description: Move a Bee Nest, with 3 bees inside, using Silk Touch

husbandry/tadpole_in_a_bucket.name: Bukkit Bukkit
husbandry/tadpole_in_a_bucket.description: Catch a Tadpole in a Bucket

husbandry/plant_seed.name: A Seedy Place
husbandry/plant_seed.description: Plant a seed and watch it grow

husbandry/wax_on.name: Wax On
husbandry/wax_on.description: Apply Honeycomb to a Copper block!

husbandry/allay_deliver_cake_to_note_blo.name: Birthday Song
husbandry/allay_deliver_cake_to_note_blo.description: Have an Allay drop a Cake at a Note Block

husbandry/tactical_fishing.name: Tactical Fishing
husbandry/tactical_fishing.description: Catch a fish... without a fishing rod!

husbandry/leash_all_frog_variants.name: When the Squad Hops into Town
husbandry/leash_all_frog_variants.description: Get each Frog variant on a Lead

husbandry/balanced_diet.name: A Balanced Diet
husbandry/balanced_diet.description: Eat everything that is edible, even if it's not good for you

husbandry/obtain_netherite_hoe.name: Serious Dedication
husbandry/obtain_netherite_hoe.description: Use a Netherite ingot to upgrade a hoe, and then reevaluate your life choices

husbandry/wax_off.name: Wax Off
husbandry/wax_off.description: Scrape Wax off of a Copper block!

husbandry/axolotl_in_a_bucket.name: The Cutest Predator
husbandry/axolotl_in_a_bucket.description: Catch an axolotl in a bucket

husbandry/froglights.name: With Our Powers Combined!
husbandry/froglights.description: Have all Froglights in your inventory

husbandry/kill_axolotl_target.name: The Healing Power of Friendship!
husbandry/kill_axolotl_target.description: Team up with an axolotl and win a fight

husbandry/repair_wolf_armor.name: Good as New
husbandry/repair_wolf_armor.description: Repair a damaged Wolf Armor using Armadillo Scutes

husbandry/whole_pack.name: The Whole Pack
husbandry/whole_pack.description: Tame one of each Wolf variant

husbandry/remove_wolf_armor.name: Shear Brilliance
husbandry/remove_wolf_armor.description: Remove Wolf Armor from a Wolf using Shears

archipelago/get_wood.name: Getting Wood
archipelago/get_wood.description: Attack a tree until a block of wood pops out

archipelago/craft_sword.name: Time to Strike!
archipelago/craft_sword.description: Use planks and sticks to make a sword

archipelago/get_pickaxe.name: Time to Mine!
archipelago/get_pickaxe.description: Use planks and sticks to make a pickaxe

archipelago/hot_topic.name: Hot Topic
archipelago/hot_topic.description: Construct a furnace out of eight cobblestone blocks.

archipelago/ride_minecart.name: On A Rail
archipelago/ride_minecart.description: Reach 1km by minecart in your statistics.

archipelago/the_lie.name: The Lie
archipelago/the_lie.description: Bake cake using wheat, sugar, milk, and eggs! Enjoy!

archipelago/overkill.name: Overkill
archipelago/overkill.description: Deal nine hearts of damage in a single hit

archipelago/obtain_bookshelf.name: Librarian
archipelago/obtain_bookshelf.description: Build some bookshelves to improve your enchantment table

archipelago/ride_pig.name: When Pigs Fly
archipelago/ride_pig.description: Fly a pig off a cliff
